Heading: Type of killer
Value: Necrophilia murderer; killed then posed victims; piquerism

Heading: Family event
Value: Mother, biological dad, and step-dad abandoned him

Heading: Age of family event
Value: Infant for biological dad, teen for mother and step-dad

Heading: Age of first sexual experience
Value: 15 (watched 2 men have anal sex in a porn shop)

Heading: Grades in school
Value: Poor grades, although had the ability to do well in school

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Types of jobs worked
Value: Labor, assistant manager, worker at Nintendo store

Heading: Living with
Value: He stayed with four girls as their guest for a short period of time. It was a rocky situation; the girls had uneasy feelings about George.

Heading: Killer age at start of series
Method of killing
Value: Strangled 1st victim, stabbed 3rd victim, beat all victims; post-mortem he shoved items into throat or vaginal area and positioned bodies in extremely unusual sexual positions

Heading: How close did killer live?
Value: All killings occurred within a small geographical area he was familiar with.

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Weapon
Value: Killer found at scene and brought to scene

Heading: Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Sentence
Value: 1st degree murder for Pohlreich, aggravated 1st degree murder of Levine and Beethe.  d to life without chance of parole and one sentence of nearly 29 years in prison.
